website_summaries.verdict: This model offers the convenience of multimedia and internet hot keys along with membrane key switches off for improved accuracy and a fluorescent, large-print keyboard for easy visibility.
pros: Membrane key switches offer a quick response to keystrokes to ensure accuracy for even fast typists
One of the quietest typing experiences possible
Wired connection is constant and reliable
Built-in hotkeys and multimedia controls also enhance efficiency during long work sessions
Luminous, easy-to-read keys are useful both for people with vision problems and for those who want to avoid eye strain
cons: The keyboard's backlight offers additional visibility at first, but may shine through the keyboards plastic covering after a little wear, becoming a distraction

customer_reviews.title: So much better
customer_reviews.text: I'm getting a little old and my eyesight isn't what it used to be. I've tried using backlit keyboards and they just made it worse. This is sooooo much better. Keys are the same size, but the letters on them are a little larger and the contrast of the yellow background with black letters makes it much easier to read. After trying 5 other keyboards, literally, I finally found what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Bo

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: I have trouble seeing my original keyboard without my Reading glasses. The AKB keyboard seems to have what I need to get the job done. However, I purchased two but one of them has stick buttons and I find myself tapping on it several times. I need it swapped out ASAP. I have a business to run. Can’t afford to stop work for issues like this. I will change my comment if I get a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. WILL

customer_reviews.title: They are awesome. I wanted to buy something small and cute
customer_reviews.text: I have a very difficult time seeing. The yellow helps the giant letters get seen. I needed the big letters. They are awesome. I wanted to buy something small and cute. My son has an adorable keyboard, but it isn't worth the torment when I lose my place and have to nearly put my face into the keyboard to see those itty bitty letters.
customer_reviews.author: Tickleberries

customer_reviews.title: But the morning light is dim here in the RV and these old eyes did luv those bright yellow keys that were so easy to read
customer_reviews.text: I bought this last Oct, six months later it has died. The internal (not much) electronics flipped out and randomly disconnects from my Windows 7 (less than a year old very expensive Custom) computer! I am back to my old trusty Microsoft curved keyboard, hard to see the lettering on these keys but it always works, for years too! But the morning light is dim here in the RV and these old eyes did luv those bright yellow keys that were so easy to read! The Adesso is Very Thin and probably flexes as you type (unlike this MS thick plastic!) I am considering a Cooler Master LED next.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas E. Kerr

customer_reviews.title: Noisy/clanky cheap keyboard
customer_reviews.text: Cheaply made keyboard. The large keys are super noisy especially the spacebar I used it for few minutes and each time I was pressing on the spacebar it made me cringe. I had to return it.
customer_reviews.author: jerome

customer_reviews.title: Good, but needs better ergonomics
customer_reviews.text: The keyboard is nice, but it needs better ergonomics. Another issue that I've got is the layout does not conform to a true QWERTY format. An extra key (\ |) adjacent to the quotation mark key (' ") causes a lot of typos
customer_reviews.author: Aviator

customer_reviews.title: Ideal Keyboard for the Price
customer_reviews.text: This is the 3rd keyboard we've had like this. We have 3 computers and as the keyboards wore out we replaced them with this one. It's easy to use and touch typing is great.
customer_reviews.author: Texas Seven

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my elderly parents, assuming they weren't going to like it (not every old dog wants to learn a new trick). Shocking, they really liked it. Plug and play. Nothing to download. The only negative, a bit deceptive when it says illumination. The keys are yellow. Nothing actually illuminates or lights up.
customer_reviews.author: A. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Clunky
customer_reviews.text: I like the bright yellow keys and the large lettering, however, the feel of the material the keys are made of seems very different (almost like rubber), the spacing seems too far apart, it is very loud while typing, the depth you have to push the keys seems excessive, the bumps on the F and the J keys are almost non-existent. If you are a slow typist, I'm sure it wouldn't make much difference; however, if you're a very fast typist it can be annoying. In a word, it is clunky.
customer_reviews.author: Markox

customer_reviews.title: easy to locate keys for non typists in all lighting conditions.
customer_reviews.text: This keyboard was a replacement for a former backlit keyboard where the letters had worn off. This ids superior to the new backlit as long as there is some light.
customer_reviews.author: Jon Wilcox

customer_reviews.title: Good for low vision
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my mother, since she has low vision and glaucoma, and a whole bunch of other things wrong with her eyes. She's able to see the keyboard just fine using a magnifying glass. (Remember she's damn near blind) this keyboard really is better than a standard black one.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Price

customer_reviews.title: Great for an 'octogenarian' with limited vision
customer_reviews.text: Keys are very responsive to touch -- Key size quite accommodating for large hands -- Response from server via key stroke is impressive ... What I did not like, (and reason I purchased 2 more keyboards), is keyboard is not 'spill-proof' as indicated in features.
customer_reviews.author: R. F. Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Highly visible keys
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for the shop. No-glare keys and brightly displayed. Highly functional.
customer_reviews.author: Diana Blackstone

customer_reviews.title: Save your money to avoid major headaches!
customer_reviews.text: Avoid this keyboard. The quality is terrible. To its credit, Adesso did allow me to exchange it for another one after the first stopped working 3 days after the 1 year warranty was up. But the replacement didn't work right out of the box. The third one won't wake the computer from sleep. Some of the keys are starting to sporadically not work. As always the problem is certain keys stop working. On this third one, it's the p key that is going first. I'm out the price of the keyboard and the return shipping I had to pay the first time I had to return a defective one. ARGH!
customer_reviews.author: mary dill

customer_reviews.title: Keys can be configured
customer_reviews.text: All the alpha/char keys can be swapped, including the home keys. Thumbs up.
customer_reviews.author: Cecil

customer_reviews.title: great on the eyes
customer_reviews.text: I am having eye surgery this month and this really came in handy. The only problem is the rubber pads were off when it arrived and they now won't stay on.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick  Scardino

customer_reviews.title: I liked the keyboard until I started typing on it
customer_reviews.text: I liked the keyboard until I started typing on it. It has 3 keys after the L key, instead of 2 keys. I kept hitting the 3rd key instead of the enter key. I returned the keyboard and purchased one very similar but with a standard enter key and only 2 keys after the L key. Did not notice the difference when I ordered it.
customer_reviews.author: Ron N.

customer_reviews.title: The color combination works much better for me than the standard black keys with white ...
customer_reviews.text: The color combination works much better for me than the standard black keys with white letters. The positioning of several keys surrounding the enter key are slightly different than a standard keyboard. For the price and the visibility of the keys...I would buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: a382453

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to read
customer_reviews.text: The letters and numbers and symbols are very easy to read.
customer_reviews.author: Ric

customer_reviews.title: Good for my old eyes
customer_reviews.text: Have failing eyesight and loved this keyboard which also looks great on my desk
customer_reviews.author: Ted S.

customer_reviews.title: works
customer_reviews.text: Easy To See And Works Great With The Plug And Play
customer_reviews.author: Doug

customer_reviews.title: Really easy to see keyboard!
customer_reviews.text: I gave it three stars because the Enter key is about 1/2 inch farther away than other keyboards.
customer_reviews.author: OnlineBuyer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a great key board to use if you vision is sliping. My wife loves it
customer_reviews.author: don

customer_reviews.title: ITEM AS DESCRIBED
customer_reviews.text: NUMBERS/LETTERS X-LARGE. EASY HOOK UP. WOULD BUY AGAIN FROM THIS SELLER.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: I can't reach the "enter" key with my pink finger ...
customer_reviews.text: I can't reach the "enter" key with my pinky finger without lifting my whole hand and I purchased this for my younger son who has smaller hands than I do. Except for this one flaw I thought this keyboard would have met our needs perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Joy

customer_reviews.title: EZ EYES KEYBOARD
customer_reviews.text: the keys are much easier to see and the large font on the keyboard is a major plus also
customer_reviews.author: Paul Walker

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Holding up well and nice big bright keys for those of us with visual issues.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Computer key board
customer_reviews.text: Just received my new keyboard today n , i must admit ,I love being able to see n type faster than i used to!!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: David W Sheppard

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars and Five stars for the second one  I ordered.
customer_reviews.text: Nice large letters ,black on yellow really pops. This is my second keyboard in less than a year .I thought my older one crapped out ,I was mistaken ,it was something else all together. I will keep this as a backup ,I love it .
customer_reviews.author: Fran Manoulian

customer_reviews.title: Short life span.
customer_reviews.text: If you want a jeyboard that quits on you after 3 months - then this is the one for you.
customer_reviews.author: lulabelle

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described. Arrived early. Works perfectly. I recommend this seller
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described. Arrived early. Works perfectly. I recommend this seller
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: like it but wan't working well for me because couldn't hit the right keys
customer_reviews.author: JULIA K SHAY

customer_reviews.title: Good visuals
customer_reviews.text: Excellent for my fading sight. Can see it in dim light. Only drawback it takes up a USB port. I only have two. But the excellent large keys make it worth the investment
customer_reviews.author: Phyllis N.

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Product
customer_reviews.text: Very satisfied with the product as it exactly works as how I want it. Worth buying it. Fast shipping, much appreciated.
customer_reviews.author: Shathish Kumar

customer_reviews.title: This keyboard is perfect for one of my students who has rather large ...
customer_reviews.text: This keyboard is perfect for one of my students who has rather large fingers and hands. It's also a great tool for special ed. students. The letters jump off the yellow background. Not very sturdy, but it has been fine so far.
customer_reviews.author: Nickel3

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It is so easy to see with my poor vision...
customer_reviews.author: donald kaletsky

customer_reviews.title: does not last
customer_reviews.text: used 4 mos, and it died, would not type and caused my pc to lock up. Awaiting refund/replacement.
customer_reviews.author: D. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Good Purchase
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my Mom for Christmas, whose vision is impaired. It has taken a little getting used to, but she likes it.
customer_reviews.author: BChandler

customer_reviews.title: Mixed
customer_reviews.text: Keys are close together and do not have the depth and feel of a typical keyboard. Large easy to read letters.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie R.

customer_reviews.title: Highly visible with addrd features.
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Great for older staff members. Perfect for training. Love that we can play music through it.
customer_reviews.author: Roseanne Chobanuk

customer_reviews.title: Color keyboards are the best
customer_reviews.text: I like the color scheme it make it easy to see
customer_reviews.author: Charles Nelson

customer_reviews.title: keyboard
customer_reviews.text: so easy to see and alot easier for me to use
customer_reviews.author: Floretta Tortorici

customer_reviews.title: I really like this key board
customer_reviews.text: I really like this key board. The bright yellow keys with black figures makes it so much easier to see the keys , even without readers.
customer_reviews.author: darwin t.

customer_reviews.title: this is the second one that i have bought, ...
customer_reviews.text: this is the second one that i have bought , in fact i am using it rt now . it is much more easier on the eyes and can find letters quickly
customer_reviews.author: RONALD BOUMAN

customer_reviews.title: It's great
customer_reviews.text: Great, bought it for my husband that has macular degeneration, he loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: What a difference the large letters and bright keys make while typing! Makes typing so much easier and faster.
customer_reviews.author: Rich Busillo

customer_reviews.title: Super keyboard. Will always use the yellow keys from ...
customer_reviews.text: Super keyboard. Will always use the yellow keys from now on.
customer_reviews.author: mikemedman

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This item works fine. It arrived on time as promised and it works as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: R. Hastings

product_meta.title: Adesso AKB-132UY - Luminous 4 X Large Print Multimedia Desktop USB Keyboard, Black Yellow
product_meta.description: The Adesso AKB-132UY Luminous 4X Large Print Desktop Keyboard is designed for those whose eyesight isn't quite what it used to be, or for anyone with a slight visual impairment. With its large 4X black print on bright yellow keys, you can type out anything from a simple Email to finishing your next novel with greater ease and less strain on your eyes. The membrane key switches provide a quiet and quick response and stand up to heavy use up to 5 million keystrokes! Not only is the Adesso AKB-132UY keyboard great for anyone with slight visual impairments, but its large, bright florescent keys make it a great and even fun tool for kids to use too!
feature_bullets: The large 4x size black print on florescent yellow keys provide excellent contrast and stronger appeal over traditional keyboards that have small, hard-to-read White letters on black keys.
With a life cycle of 5 million keystrokes, membrane key switches provide a faster response along with a quieter typing experience.
Control your media functions with one-touch using the built-in multimedia hot keys. You can also navigate the Internet and access your email with the built-in internet hotkeys.
8 keys - (media player, volume down, volume up, mute, play/pause, previous, next, Stop)
6 keys - (My computer, search, calculator, mail, home, favorites)
The large 4X size black print on florescent yellow keys provide excellent contrast and stronger appeal over traditional keyboards that have small, hard-to-read white letters on black keys.
With a life cycle of 5 million keystrokes, Membrane key switches provide a faster response along with a quieter typing experience.
Control your media functions with one-touch using the built-in Multimedia Hot Keys. You can also navigate the Internet and access your email with the built-in Internet Hotkeys.
8 Keys - (Media Player, Volume Down, Volume Up, Mute, Play/Pause, Previous, Next, Stop)
6 Keys - (My Computer, Search, Calculator, Mail, Home, Favorites)
